description: The API makes it easy to create web and desktop applications that integrate with your account. Possible uses for it include automatically creating and sending invoices when users sign up on your website, pulling lists of client information, copying data to 3rd party services, and more.

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to retrive access token.

args.name: clientId
args.info: Required: Your clientId obtained from Freshbooks.

args.name: clientSecret
args.info: Required: Your clientSecret obtained from Freshbooks.

args.name: code
args.info: Required: Authorization code.

args.name: redirectUri
args.info: Required: Your redirect uri.

blocks.name: refreshAccessToken
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to retrive access token from refresh token.

args.name: clientId
args.info: Required: Your clientId obtained from Freshbooks.

args.name: clientSecret
args.info: Required: Your clientSecret obtained from Freshbooks.

args.name: refreshToken
args.info: Required: Refresh token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: redirectUri
args.info: Required: Your redirect uri.

blocks.name: getIdentityInfo
blocks.description: The endpoint provides OAuth authentication, preferences, permissions, roles, and business information.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

blocks.name: getExpense
blocks.description: The endpoint allows to retrive information about single expense.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: accountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: expenseId
args.info: Required: The ID of the expense.

args.name: include
args.info: Optional: Indicate wich additional data will be include. Comma-separated. Example: category,project,...

blocks.name: createExpense
blocks.description: The endpoint allows to create new expense.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: accountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: amount
args.info: Required: The amount of the expense.

args.name: date
args.info: Required: The date of the expense.

args.name: staffId
args.info: Required: id of related staff member if applicable.

args.name: categoryId
args.info: Required: id of related expense category.

args.name: markupPercent
args.info: Optional: string-decimal, note of percent to mark expense up.

args.name: projectId
args.info: Optional: id of related project if applicable.

args.name: clientId
args.info: Optional: id of related client if applicable.

args.name: taxPercent1
args.info: Optional: string-decimal tax amount.

args.name: taxName1
args.info: Optional: name of first tax.

args.name: taxPercent2
args.info: Optional: string-decimal tax amount for second tax.

args.name: taxName2
args.info: Optional: name of second tax.

args.name: isDuplicate
args.info: Optional: true/false is duplicated expense.

args.name: profileId
args.info: Optional: id of related profile if applicable.

args.name: accountName
args.info: Optional: name of related account if applicable.

args.name: transactionId
args.info: Optional: id of related transaction if applicable.

args.name: invoiceId
args.info: Optional: id of related invoice if applicable.

args.name: taxAmount1
args.info: Optional: amount for first tax.

args.name: taxCode1
args.info: Optional: 3-letter currency code for first tax.

args.name: taxAmount2
args.info: Optional: amount for second tax.

args.name: taxCode2
args.info: Optional: 3-letter currency code for second tax.

args.name: visState
args.info: Optional: 0 for active, 1 for deleted.

args.name: status
args.info: Optional: values from expense status table. 0 - internal (-internal- rather than client); 1 - outstanding (has client, needs to be applied to an invoice); 2 - invoiced (has client, attached to an invoice); 4 - recouped (has client, attached to an invoice, and paid).

args.name: bankName
args.info: Optional: name of bank expense was imported from, if applicable.

args.name: vendor
args.info: Optional: name of vendor.

args.name: extSystemId
args.info: Optional: id of related contractor system if applicable.

args.name: hasReceipt
args.info: Optional: true/false has receipt attached.

args.name: notes
args.info: Optional: notes about expense.

args.name: extInvoiceId
args.info: Optional: id of related contractor invoice if applicable.

args.name: amountCode
args.info: Optional: 3-letter currency code.

args.name: compoundedTax
args.info: Optional: true/false tax2 was a compound tax.

blocks.name: getAllExpenses
blocks.description: The endpoint allows to retrive information about all expenses.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: accountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: page
args.info: Optional: The ID of the retun page. Default 0.

args.name: perPage
args.info: Optional: Number of results to return. Default 100.

args.name: search
args.info: Optional: Filter to search. Pattern: key=value,key=value,...

args.name: include
args.info: Optional: Indicate wich additional data will be include. Comma-separated. Example: category,project,...

args.name: transactionId

args.name: invoiceId
args.info: Optional: id of related invoice if applicable.

args.name: taxAmount1
args.info: Optional: amount for first tax.

args.name: taxCode1
args.info: Optional: 3-letter currency code for first tax.

args.name: taxAmount2
args.info: Optional: amount for second tax.

args.name: taxCode2
args.info: Optional: 3-letter currency code for second tax.

args.name: visState
args.info: Optional: 0 for active, 1 for deleted.

args.name: status
args.info: Optional: values from expense status table. 0 - internal (-internal- rather than client); 1 - outstanding (has client, needs to be applied to an invoice); 2 - invoiced (has client, attached to an invoice); 4 - recouped (has client, attached to an invoice, and paid).

args.name: bankName

args.name: amountCode

blocks.name: getGateways
blocks.description: The information returned by these endpoints specifies what payment processors are enabled for your Businesses.

args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: page

args.name: perPage
args.info: Optional: Number of results to return. Default 100.

blocks.name: deleteSingleGateway
blocks.description: Endpoint allows to delete single gateway.

args.name: accountId

args.name: gatewayId
args.info: Required: The ID of the gateway.

blocks.name: getInvoices
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to retrive information about invoices.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: accountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: page
args.info: Optional: The ID of the retun page. Default 0.

args.name: perPage
args.info: Optional: Number of results to return. Default 100.

args.name: search
args.info: Optional: Filter to search. Pattern: key=value,key=value,...

args.name: include
args.info: Optional: Indicate wich additional data will be include. Comma-separated. Example: category,project,...

blocks.name: createSingleInvoice
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to create single invoice.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: accountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: customerId
args.info: Required: The ID of the client.

args.name: createDate
args.info: Required: The date of the invoice.

args.name: ownerId
args.info: Optional: id of creator of invoice. 1 if business admin, other if created by e.g. a contractor.

args.name: estimateId
args.info: Optional: id of associated estimate, 0 if none.

args.name: basecampId
args.info: Optional: id of connected basecamp account, 0 if none.

args.name: sentId
args.info: Optional: userid of user who sent the invoice, typically 1 for admin.

args.name: status
args.info: Optional: Invoice Status.

args.name: parent
args.info: Optional: id of object this invoice was generated from, 0 if none.

args.name: displayStatus
args.info: Optional: Description of status shown in FreshBooks UI, one of 'draft', 'created', 'sent', 'viewed', or 'outstanding'.

args.name: autobillStatus
args.info: Optional: one of retry, failed, or success.

args.name: paymentStatus
args.info: Optional: description of payment status. One of 'unpaid', 'partial', 'paid', and 'auto-paid'. See the v3_status table on this page for descriptions of each.

args.name: lastOrderStatus
args.info: Optional: describes status of last attempted payment.

args.name: disputeStatus
args.info: Optional: description of whether invoice has been disputed.

args.name: depositStatus
args.info: Optional: description of deposits applied to invoice. One of 'paid', 'unpaid', 'partial', 'none', and 'converted'.

args.name: autoBill
args.info: Optional: whether this invoice has a credit card saved.

args.name: v3Status
args.info: Optional: description of Invoice Status, see V3 Status Table.

args.name: invoiceNumber
args.info: Optional: user-specified and visible invoice id.

args.name: generationDate
args.info: Optional: date invoice generated from object, null if it wasn't, YYYY-MM-DD if it was.

args.name: discountValue
args.info: Optional: decimal-string amount.

args.name: discountDescription
args.info: Optional: public note about discount.

args.name: poNumber
args.info: Optional: Post Office box number for address on invoice.

args.name: currencyCode
args.info: Optional: three-letter currency code for invoice.

args.name: language
args.info: Optional: two-letter language code, e.g. "en".

args.name: terms
args.info: Optional: terms listed on invoice.

args.name: notes
args.info: Optional: Notes listed on invoice.

args.name: address
args.info: Optional: First line of address on invoice.

args.name: depositAmount
args.info: Optional: amount required as deposit, null if none.

args.name: depositPercentage
args.info: Optional: percent of the invoice's value required as a deposit.

args.name: gmail
args.info: Optional: whether to send via ground mail.

args.name: showAttachments
args.info: Optional: whether attachments on invoice are rendered.

args.name: visState
args.info: Optional: 0 for active, 1 for deleted.

args.name: street
args.info: Optional: street for address on invoice.

args.name: street2
args.info: Optional: second line of street for address on invoice.

args.name: city
args.info: Optional: city for address on invoice.

args.name: province
args.info: Optional: Province for address on invoice.

args.name: code
args.info: Optional: zip code for address on invoice.

args.name: country
args.info: Optional: Country for address on invoice.

args.name: organization
args.info: Optional: Name of organization being invoiced.

args.name: fname
args.info: Optional: First name of Client on invoice.

args.name: lname
args.info: Optional: Last name of client being invoiced.

args.name: vatName
args.info: Optional: Value Added Tax name if provided.

args.name: vatNumber
args.info: Optional: Value Added Tax number if provided.

args.name: dueOffsetDays
args.info: Optional: Number of days from creation that invoice is due.

args.name: address
args.info: Optional: First line of address on invoice.

args.name: depositAmount

args.name: depositPercentage
args.info: Optional: percent of the invoice's value required as a deposit.

args.name: showAttachments

args.name: visState

args.name: street
args.info: Optional: street for address on invoice.

args.name: province

args.name: code
args.info: Optional: zip code for address on invoice.

args.name: organization

blocks.name: createSingleItem
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to create new item.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: accountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: name
args.info: Required: The name of the item.

args.name: quantity
args.info: Optional: decimal-string number to multiply unit cost by.

args.name: inventory
args.info: Optional: decimal-string count of inventory.

args.name: amount
args.info: Optional: amount paid on invoice, to two decimal places.

args.name: code
args.info: Optional: three-letter currency code.

args.name: tax1
args.info: Optional: id of tax on invoice.

args.name: tax2
args.info: Optional: id of second tax on invoice if applicable.

args.name: visState
args.info: Optional: 0 for active, 1 for deleted.

args.name: description
args.info: Optional: descriptive text for item.

blocks.name: getPayments

blocks.name: createSinglePayment
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to create new payment.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: accountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: invoiceId
args.info: Required: id of related invoice.

args.name: amount
args.info: Required: amount paid on invoice, to two decimal places.

args.name: date
args.info: Required: date the payment was made, YYYY-MM-DD format.

args.name: type
args.info: Required: "Check", "Credit", "Cash", etc.

args.name: creditId
args.info: Optional: id of related credit.

args.name: code
args.info: Optional: three-letter currency code.

args.name: clientId
args.info: Optional: id of client who made the payment.

args.name: visState
args.info: Optional: 0 for active, 1 for deleted.

args.name: note
args.info: Optional: notes on payment, often used for credit card reference number.

args.name: overpaymentId
args.info: Optional: id of related overpayment if relevant.

args.name: gateway
args.info: Optional: the payment processor used, if any.

args.name: fromCredit
args.info: Optional: whether or not the payment was converted from a Credit on a Client's account.

blocks.name: getSystemInfo
blocks.description: An Accounting System represents an entity that can send invoices. It is the central point of association between all of a single Administrator of a single Business Invoices, Clients, Staff, Expenses, and Reports.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: accountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: systemId
args.info: Optional: The ID of the system. The value is only meaningful if a user has access to multiple systems.

blocks.name: getTaxes

args.info: Optional: Number of results to return. Default 100.

args.info: Optional: Filter to search. Pattern: key=value,key=value,...

blocks.name: createSingleTax
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to create new tax.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: accountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: name
args.info: Required: The name of the new tax.

args.name: number
args.info: Optional: an external number that identifies your tax submission.

args.name: amount
args.info: Optional: string-decimal representing percentage value of tax.

args.name: compound
args.info: Optional: compound taxes are calculated on top of primary taxes. True || false

blocks.name: getClients

args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: page
args.info: Optional: The ID of the retun page. Default 0.

args.name: perPage
args.info: Optional: Number of results to return. Default 100.

args.name: search

args.name: include
args.info: Optional: Indicate wich additional data will be include. Comma-separated. Example: category,project,...

blocks.name: createSingleClient
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to create new client.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Required: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: accountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the account.

args.name: busPhone
args.info: Optional: business phone number.

args.name: companyIndustry
args.info: Optional: description of industry client is in.

args.name: companySize
args.info: Optional: size of client's company.

args.name: currencyCode
args.info: Optional: 3-letter shortcode for preferred currency.

args.name: email
args.info: Optional: client email.

args.name: fax
args.info: Optional: client fax.

args.name: fname
args.info: Optional: first name.

args.name: lname
args.info: Optional: last name.

args.name: homePhone
args.info: Optional: home phone number.

args.name: language
args.info: Optional: shortcode indicating user language e.g. "en".

args.name: mobPhone
args.info: Optional: mobile phone number.

args.name: note
args.info: Optional: notes kept by admin about client.

args.name: organization
args.info: Optional: name for client's business.

args.name: billingCode
args.info: Optional: billing postal code.

args.name: billingCountry

args.name: billingStreet
args.info: Optional: billing street address.

args.name: billingStreet2
args.info: Optional: billing street address second part.

args.info: Optional: prefers email over ground mail. true || false

args.name: prefGmail
args.info: Optional: prefers ground mail over email. true || false

args.info: Optional: "visibility state", active, deleted, or archived.
